label: Merger of Acquisitions
name: merger-of-acquisitions
description: Merges three acquisitions into one. Specific to 2018_HRVT project - use with caution anywhere else.
author: Noah Mercer

all_sessions.description: If checked, runs the gear on all sessions in the project.

session_id.description: If provided, only runs the gear on this session.

acquisition_prefixes.description: Comma-separated list of acquisition prefixes that will be identified as a split acquisition. For example, if you enter 'ER1_, RS_', then all acquisitions whose labels match the regular expression '^ER1_[123]$' or '^RS1_[123]$' will treated as a multi-part acquisition to be merged.
acquisition_prefixes.default: RS_, ER1_, ER2_, PB1_, PB2_, PB3_, TM_, UG_
